title: What would be a better option between Madras University and IGNOU for distance education for a master’s of public administration? - Quora

response.answer_text: Madras University is one of the most reputed University and is known all over the world. Apart from correspondence course it also offers regular integrated course of public administration. If you are from south India, I would suggest you to go for Madras University. It offers wider range of flexibility.
IGNOU is very flexible when it comes to distance education as they have centres everywhere in India. And IGNOU has earned reputation in distance learning.
